headline: Founder & CEO at Jenfi l Jenfi is an alternative revenue-based financing company for digital-native businesses and startups for Southeast Asia.
summary:
Jeffrey is the Co-Founder and CEO of Jenfi, a financial technology company that provides revenue-based financing to rapidly growing businesses in Asia. Jenfi aims to assist digitally-enabled businesses, such as ecommerce ventures and high growth startups, to accelerate their sales velocity by funding their marketing, inventory, and growth campaigns.

Jeff brings a strong operational and financial background from GuavaPass where he served as the Co-Founder & CEO. Prior to that, he helmed the role of Head of Corporate Development at BeachMint, a venture-backed social ecommerce company in Santa Monica (founded by the Co-Founder of MySpace). During his time there, he ran the company’s Business Intelligence and Analytics divisions where he forefronted the merger between BeachMint and Lucky Magazine, a Conde Nast subsidiary, forming The Lucky Group.

Prior to this, he helped launch a hedge fund in Singapore; worked as an investment associate at a credit opportunities and special situations hedge fund in Chicago; and as an investment banker at Lehman Brothers. 

Jeffrey graduated with an MBA from the University of Chicago Booth School of Business and received a B.S. in Industrial Engineering with an additional major in Economics at Northwestern University.

experiences.title: Founder and CEO
experiences.description: Jenfi is a financial technology company that provides revenue-based financing to rapidly growing businesses in Asia. Jenfi aims to assist digitally-enabled businesses, such as ecommerce ventures and high growth startups, to accelerate their sales velocity by funding their marketing, inventory, and growth campaigns.

experiences.title: Founder and CEO
experiences.description:
GuavaPass is a technology platform providing its members with access to a network of high quality fitness studios and healthy-living experts across Asia and the Middle East.

ClassPass acquired GuavaPass in January 2019.

experiences.title: Head of Corporate Development
experiences.description:
Key member of executive team. Reported directly to founders (CEO & President). 
150 person organization and over $90 million USD raised. 

Led merger between BeachMint and Lucky Magazine (Condé Nast)

Ran key corporate initiatives, including acquisitions, foreign joint ventures, and strategic partnerships. Led negotiations and due diligence of major transactions.

*BeachMint renamed to The Lucky Group*

Content-to-commerce company that combines the best-in-class technology from the team that created BeachMint with the editorial excellence of Lucky magazine. Aspirational but accessible, luxurious but relatable, The Lucky Group’s mission is to change the way women shop by creating content that fuses inspiration, discovery and purchase—all through Lucky’s signature editorial point of view.

The Lucky Group operates Lucky’s print, digital, mobile and new e-commerce platform, and continues to develop BeachMint’s private label offering within the jewelry, footwear, apparel and intimate verticals.

The Lucky Group, Inc.’s investors include Condé Nast, Goldman Sachs, NEA, Pritzker Group Venture Partners, Trinity Ventures and Scale Venture Partners. Anna Wintour, Condé Nast Artistic Director, serves as an advisor to The Lucky Group, alongside advisors Ashley Olsen and Mary-Kate Olsen.

experiences.title: Head of Business Intelligence & Analytics
experiences.description: Managed team of data scientists, business intelligence professionals, and database administrators.

experiences.title: Investments
experiences.description:
Hedge Fund - Southeast Asian Equities
Southeast Asia focus: Indonesia, Thailand, and Philippines.

Founded in 2011, Toccata Capital Pte. Ltd. is a Singapore-based registered fund management company.  We employ a thoughtful value-driven research process to hand-select productive companies. Our neighbourhood is Southeast Asia, a diverse region with a fascinating history and home to 600 million people.

Handled equity research and made buy/sell recommendations as first member of the investment team. Worked directly with founding principal to set up fund.

experiences.title: Investment Associate
experiences.description:
Credit Opportunities & Special Situations Hedge Fund ($1.2B)

Victory Park provides direct financing solutions to small cap and middle market companies across a wide range of industries. The firm focuses on complex situations and seeks to build long term sustainable value in companies.

Made direct investments in biopharmaceuticals, fintech, oil & gas services, medical software, and bridge financing, distressed, and bankruptcy situations.

First member of the investment team (5 person team). Reported directly to founding principal.

M&A, restructuring advisory, and leveraged buyouts
Ranked top of analyst class
